headline: NEWPORT 3 AXIS MICRO TRANSLATOR
keywords: damp rods jacks rods mirror holders mounts plates posts gimble lens mount rail carrier adpter clamp base bracket diaphrams carriers
specstable:
Manufacturer Newport
Model 466
Type Translator, 3 Axis
Other Information

Travel:

  • Coarse adjustment: 2mm(lockable)
  • Fine adjustment: 0.3mm
    Resolution: ±0.1 micrometer
    Parallelism: 5 arc-sec
    Load capacity: 2.2 lbs.
    Backlash: negligible
    Runout: negligible
    Orthogonality: ±5 arc-min
    Cross coupling: <10 micrometers
Condition Good
